divs: Sighting DetailsI was sleeping, woke up at around three am .. I saw some real bright lights they were looking at me all I could think was how could a ufo be so smalli really rhought it was cool but did not move or budge.. I dont remember when it left or what else happened. the object was ovalish the size of a ten gallon aquarium.. still in motion.
Summary: I was in my bedroom it was besides my bed. Small, many lights
